title: Women belong in tech – celebrating innovation in our industry - The Official Microsoft Blog - Microsoft
content: Women belong in tech – celebrating innovation in our industry - The Official Microsoft Blog  Microsoft
description: On International Women’s Day, we celebrate the potential of women and girls everywhere, and their ideas and innovations that are shaping our future. March is also Women’s History Month in the United States. Introduced in the late 1980s, this month is a celebration of the numerous, but often overlooked, accomplishments by women across history, culture...
